transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji aapka call tha.
Customer: Madam kahan se baat kar rahe hain kis company se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji madam kis company se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Sorry.
Executive: Madam kis company se baat kar rahi hain aap?
Customer: Kis company se National Agrotech se baat kar rahi hun.
Executive: National Agrotech se baat kar rahi hain.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Madam very good evening.
Executive: Madam Prashant baat kar raha hun main IndiaMART office se senior manager.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Hello actually aapka complaint receive hua tha na IndiaMART ki services ko leke.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To usi ke sambandh mein call back kiya tha madam.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Madam abhi subah hum log ka discussion kya chal raha tha agar us cheez pe nahi hai already to hum aapko is services mein aap mere zehen mein ye cheeze highlight hui hain ki aapko kuch problem aa rahi hai face kar rahe hain ye issues hain.
Executive: Right to us pe kaam karne ka thoda sa time dijiye.
Executive: Is pe bhi result aapko behtar karke denge.
Customer: But main already maine dekhiye meri baat suniye maine complaint ki ki mujhe buyleads ko leke complaint aa rahi hai ki matlab constantly complaint thi meri ki matlab ek bhi notification jitni bhi aayi thi ki just within a microsecond maine wo consume karne ki koshish ki fir bhi wo expired hogi aur ye complaint meri continue jab se main aapke sath join hui hun tab se hai aur iske bare mein baar baar complaint kar chuki hun theek hai to pehle main Anju ji se meri baat hui thi unse baat ki to resolve nahi hua to maine directly customer care pe call kiya fir wahan se baat hui fir wapas Anju ji se baat hui to resolve nahi hua second mera issue ye tha ki matlab ki mujhe business nahi mil raha hai theek hai ab maine 30 28000 aapki fee hai aur with GST maine 33 something maine fee pay ki hai.
Executive: Ji madam 40 diye hain kal se usi cheez pe discussion ho raha hai hum log ka kitna diya hai kitna bachaya hai kya hai kya nahi hai right.
Customer: Haan ab listen to me first ab maine itna pay kiya hai ab jab main ye baat kar rahi hun ki mujhe business nahi mil raha hai to ab mujhe ye bol rahe hain ki matlab aapki jo matlab meri company sirf wo matlab within matlab local mein hi dikhe to ab main itne sare paise pay kar rahi hun.
Executive: Achcha ye aapko kisne bataya ki aapka keval local mein dikhega?
Customer: Ye Anju ji se baat hui meri unhone bataya.
Executive: Theek hai dekhiye IndiaMART ka main ye keh raha tha ki aap inquiries check karenge to aisa hai kya aapko ki keval Agast se sorry keval Thambal se requirement generate ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Direct inquiry ki baat kar raha hun main.
Customer: Inquiry nahi bol rahi business hi mera main issue wahi hai ki abhi tak maine jab se join kiya matlab theek hai three to four months hue mujhe bilkul bhi aapki or se koi business nahi mila hai aur upar se do spam hamare sath ho gaye wo already alag baat hai.
Customer: Ek baar mere paas maine ek Mumbai ko lekar bhi complaint ki thi ke matlab ke ek mere paas sample order mangwaya theek hai maine sample order send bhi kar diya fir bol rahe hain ki hum aapko agar aapka sample order clear ho jata hai to humko aapko bada order denge theek hai ab wo sample order ke liye bhi hum wait kar rahe the to uske bhi sample order ke paise bhi wo pay nahi kiye aur ab wo jo customer hai wo hume ghosting kar raha hai ab wo to finish ho gaya uske baad Delhi se hamari baat hui thi to Delhi se bhi humne baat ki to ab wo bhi unhone kya kiya ki matlab unhone hamare paas customized sample order banwaye theek hai ab wo sample bhi ab wo hume return kar rahe hain to theek hai matlab theek hai hume koi genuine customer bhi nahi mil raha hai sabse badi baat to wo hai aur business to bilkul bhi nahi ho raha hai to main hum aapki service se hi satisfied nahi hai sabse bada problem to yahi hai isliye mujhe ab aapke sath continue nahi karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai ab aapko complaint aayi hai services ko leke main ye keh raha hun ki mujhe time dijiye hum log is pe kaam karte hain aur definitely aapko thoda sa behtar result karke denge.
Customer: Meri baat suniye ki matlab ki jab main bol rahi hun ki mujhe ye aa rahi hai to ab aap mujhe bol rahe ho ki ab theek hai agar aapko business badhana hai aapka ye problems hai to isko solve karna hai to ab aap.
Executive: Wo mujhe kaise pata chalega mujhe to Anju ne bataya ki aapko behtar deal bana ke dun to maine behtar deal bana ke di aapko agar aap nahi continue karna chahti hain us deal ke sath aap seedha deny kijiye boliye ki mujhe isi services mein business nahi chahiye.
Customer: Aap product area mein business karwa ke.
Customer: Meri baat suniye.
Executive: Business ki opportunities aur behtar karwa dunga.
Customer: Business opportunity wo ye baat hai ki matlab ki jo maine pay kiya hai uske andar to wo wo meri jo issues hain wo resolve nahi ho rahe aur uske instead aap mujhe kya bol rahe ho ki matlab agar aapko karna hai to isme aur paisa lagaiye tab jaake aapka kaam hoga company ke sath yahi baat yahi baat hui hai.
Customer: Theek hai to mujhe wo aisa kaam karna hi nahi hai ki jab aap mujhe matlab ki mere basic pe ab mere issues resolve nahi kar pa rahe ho aur aapke aur paisa lagane ki baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Are koi paisa mat lagaiye aap main main main Anju ko mana kar dunga.
Customer: Nahi meri baat suniye mujhe continue nahi karna hai mujhe continue nahi karna hai really I am not satisfied with your service.
Executive: Main samajhta hun ki abhi tak ki jo services chali hain aapko business nahi mila hai to main sure karta hun ki aapko koi bhi main aapko keh raha hun.
Customer: Matlab ki aapke koi customers hain wo bhi genuine nahi hai.
Customer: Hamara matlab abhi tak aisa hua hai ki six to 7000 to hamara already lost ho chuka hai to wo to maine matlab ek baar complaint karke maine chhod diya chalo theek hai jaane do ho sakta hai ki starting mein hamare sath aisa ho sakta hai karke maine isko ignore kar diya but aap mujhe bol rahe ho ki matlab mujhe.
Executive: Aap party ki details wagera share ki hoti na us time pe hum zahir si baat hai sir hum ki hum log complaint wagera.
Customer: Maine aapko maine screenshot bhi share kiye hain main bhi kiye the na sir nahi kiye mere paas hai screenshot bhi main share kar sakti hun party ke jo bhi details hain wo sari main share kar sakti hun.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Mere paas kya whatsapp pe jo bhi chat hui hai humne yahan se parcel courier kiya hai uske sare bhi hamare paas photos hain wo sara hai wo main sara share kar sakti hun.
Executive: Main main abhi aapko apna whatsapp number share kar raha hun aap ek baar details wagera bhej dijiyega jo bhi best action le sakte hain un clients ke against right wo bhi le lenge hum log.
Executive: Filhal to main aapko ye keh raha hun ki main Anju ko bol deta hun aur apni team mein sabko restrict kar deta hun ki koi bhi aapse kisi bhi higher services ke regarding baat na kare aur management ko bolta hun ki is services ko thoda bahut kuch boost up karwaye taki aapka inquiry ka flow aur generate ho theek hai.
Customer: Aap aap inquiry to aapko karni hi hogi agar main aapki customer rehti hun ya nahi rehti see you have to do kyuki aap mere sath aisa hua hai fraud kal kisi aur aapke koi dusre genuine customer ke sath bhi fraud ho sakta hai theek hai to wo aapko apne.
Executive: Bilkul main keh raha hun ki aapko aapko aapke sath jo bhi galat hua hai wo cheez wo cheez karenge main kaha mana kar raha hun.
Executive: Main keh raha hun wo bhi karte hain madam aur main main main ye keh raha hun ki ab se aapko koi bhi services wagera ki upgrade karne ke liye baat nahi karega jo existing services hai usme jo bhi behtar ho sakta hai wo karwate hain.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi baat wo bhi hai nahi mujhe nahi karna hai mujhe local mein to mera business waise bhi ho raha hai.
Executive: Are local mein nahi karwayenge madam national level pe business karna hai.
Executive: Bilkul national level pe hi karwayenge madam.
Executive: IndiaMART to yahi karta hai IndiaMART ka to sabse bada fayda yahi hai ki trade just dial wagera ki tarah thodi na hai ki aapko local level pe hi visibility dega business dega IndiaMART ka sabse bada yahi hai ki hamara jab chahe jis type pe jis mode mein chahe use kar sakte hain switch kar sakti hain jaise agar abhi aapko local level pe chahiye local level ki validity consume kijiye hamara software totally is based hai aapko local level pe inquiries wagera la ke dega agar aapko aapko pan India ki chahiye aap pan India ki lead wagera consume kijiye jahan se marzi padta hai aapki visibility pan India level pe ho jayegi wahan se direct inquiries milne lag jayegi right.
Customer: Maine jab join kiya tabhi baat ki thi kyuki main matlab mujhe pan India mein hi business karna chaungi aur wo bhi mujhe bulk mein hi kyuki hum manufacturer hain.
Executive: Wahi karte hain bulk mein leads dilwate hain madam aapko retail mein hum log business hi nahi kar rahe theek hai theek hai chalo sample order ke liye karke humne itna kar bhi liya but fir bhi nahi hai in short main aapki service se satisfied nahi hun mujhe aapke sath.
Executive: Mujhe pata hai nahi satisfied hain nahi to aap aap bolti na khul ke bolti ki aap satisfied hain aap nahi satisfied hain tabhi to bol rahi hain aapki baton se hi vishwas hai mujhe main keval keh raha hun ki.
Customer: Main bol rahi hun already baat ho chuki hai mujhe baar baar.
Executive: Bilkul baat ho chuki hai to main wahi keh raha hun ki.
Customer: Kar chuki hun but wo resolve nahi hua I have given you enough of the time theek hai but fir bhi aapki taraf se mere issues resolve nahi hue to lastly mujhe ye ab kal bhi meri baat hui thi kal bhi maine baat karne ke yahi meri complaint karne ke liye hi maine call kiya tha aur jab Anju se meri baat ye hui ke main ye ye problems face kar rahi hun abhi tak iske issues resolve nahi hue hain to ye mujhe trust seal wali baat kar rahe hain matlab ki kya hai matlab main sirf aap paisa hi aap bhi to aap dekhiye main main aapse keval Anju ki baat nahi hui thi aapse meri bhi baat hui thi agar aapko yaad ho to.
Customer: Aapse bhi.
Executive: Keval Anju se baat nahi hui thi to detail mein aapne us time pe jab unhone call mujhe transfer kiya to agar are madam ek baar bolne to diya kijiye aap kuch bhi complete nahi karne deti hain.
Customer: Maine isliye kal bhi aapki baat suni mujhe aaj morning mein bhi maine aap logon ki hi baat suni ab mujhe nahi karna hai.
Executive: Agar aapko nahi karna tha kal bhi to aapne detail wagera aapne bola us pe fir humne backend end se baat kiya aur proforma wagera generate karwaya sari cheeze karwai wo aage nahi badhta aap aap aapne jab Anju ne mujhe call transfer kiya kal aur hum baat kar rahe the to ek baar bhi aapne services ke dissatisfaction ko leke nahi baat kari kya behtar pricing ho sakti hai trust seal mein kya benefit milega inhi sab cheezon ko leke humne baat kiya tha main wahi keh raha hun ki aapko mujhe bolna chahiye tha ab aap ab mujhe pata chala hai na main kisi ko pitch karne dunga main is services mein main khud isko har 10 din pe 15 din pe review karunga jahan pe agar kuch galat aa raha hai cheeze sahi ho rahi hai to main khud is cheez ko handle karunga directly ab right aap us cheez ki tension mat lo madam.
Executive: Theek hai wo meri zimmedari hai ki main aapko services mein aur thoda sa behtar jo bhi opportunities wagera hai wo karwa ke dun pan India level ki inquiries wagera generate karwaun right aur wo main karwane chal raha hun aap tension mat lo us cheez ka theek hai madam.
Customer: Aur ye mera issue kitne time mein resolve hoga?
Executive: Madam agle ek hafte 10 din mein aapko farak mehsoos ho jayega isi services mein aapko pan India ki requirement generate hone lag jayegi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Pakka.
Customer: Achcha theek hai haan to 10 days mein wait karti hun theek hai ab 10 days mein mera issue resolve nahi ho raha hai to main continue nahi karungi ye mera final decision hai.
Executive: Aapko pan India ki lead chahiye na wo main la ke dunga.
Customer: Chahiye aur mujhe proper business chahiye aapki or se.
Executive: Theek hai madam business dekhiye business bahut sari cheezon pe depend karta hai right business ka matlab ho gaya aap aap aap how to handle the customer right kai baar aapke prices pe depend karta hai kai baar us location se jahan se customer ne requirement post kiya hai us location pe koi dusra customer mil gaya jo same product mein deal kar raha hai to uska costing delivery charges wagera bach jata hai bahut sari cheeze hoti hain wo aapko manage karna hai lead main aapko behtar generate karwa ke dunga wo meri zimmedari hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai main dekh rahi hun theek hai mujhe difference dikh raha hai to theek hai warna nahi haan.
Executive: Theek hai madam aur main abhi aapko ye dusra wala number aapka hai kya main mera number to whatsapp pe hai hi aapko kal maine aapko aaj subah bhi maine aapko screenshot wagera bheja tha kal sham ko bhi bheja tha in fact theek hai to ek kaam karte hain madam.
Customer: Do.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek kaam karta hun mera wo wala whatsapp number hai aap kabhi bhi chahe to mujhe whatsapp pe reh ke connect kar sakti hain services wagera ke issues ke liye theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan mujhe meri mujhe mere number pe directly connect kar lijiyega koi dikkat nahi hai mujhe theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aapka ye jo concern raise hua tha.
Customer: Yaad hai us pe hi karungi.
Executive: Madam main bol raha hun na main kahin bhag thodi na ja raha hun 10 din ke liye 10 din ke baad theek hai.
Customer: Nahi main bol rahi hun ki matlab aapne jo number se mujhe share kiya hai link na wo us pe hi contact karun na main sirf puch rahi hun.
Executive: Haan bilkul aap us pe us number pe contact kar sakti hain wo jo price ka maine details structure bana ke diya tha na aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm kal sham ko jaane se pehle.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo mera hi number hai personal official number dono hain theek hai aap mujhe us number pe directly connect kar lijiyega baki main ye keh raha tha ki jo ye matlab jo concern raise hua tha theek hai uske regarding hum log baat to karte hi rahenge right to ye concern main close kar de raha hun filhal ke liye right.
Customer: Theek hai dekhte hain fir agar nahi hoga to main main fir baad mein.
Executive: Na main bhag ja raha hun na IndiaMART bhag ja raha hai na aap kahin ja rahi hain madam yahi hain hum log theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai yahi hai theek hai aur definitely aapke jo services wagera se related jo bhi dissatisfaction hai main ye koshish karunga ki wo thoda sa jo aapka experience kharab hai wo thoda sa behtar ho theek hai chaliye aapke catalog wagera pe kaam karwata hun aur jo bhi cheeze hain wo sari cheeze karwa ke main aapko ek final deta hun right update baki aapka jo concern hai wo main close kar raha hun theek hai ek feedback ka mail jayega hamare aur aapke conversation ke basis pe right.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To thoda bahut main jo feedback jayega na madam wo meri aur aapki conversation ke base pe rahega na ki aapka jo experience raha IndiaMART ke basis pe theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan I know.
Executive: Haan theek hai to wo abhi ke conversation ke basis pe rahega to please uske anusar wo feedback share kar dijiyega baki services mein koi bhi issues ho to aap please mujhe connect kijiye ga kabhi bhi kisi bhi time pe subah 9 baje se leke sham ko 6 baje ke beech mein theek hai I will be ready to help you at any time theek hai.
Customer: Okay haan.
Executive: Haan theek hai main abhi aapko dobara se whatsapp number pe ping kar de raha hun theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai uske baad hi aapka complaint close karunga chaliye thank you thank you very much for time madam thanks for understanding thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with buyleads and business.

- Sample orders not paid and ghosting by customers.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Company visibility only in local area.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve issues in 10 days.

- Promised to generate pan India leads.

- Offered direct contact for any service issues.

- Executive will review the account.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait for 10 days.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, business, pan india, refund, spam, services
